actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.
Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-401.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2172, a bill to implement the International Sugar Agreement, 1977, between the United States and foreign countries, to protect the welfare of consumers of sugar and of those engaged in the domestic sugar industry, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2172 (Sugar agreement implementation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2172, a bill to implement the International Sugar Agreement, 1977, between the United States and foreign countries, to protect the welfare of consumers of sugar and of those engaged in the domestic sugar industry, and for other purposes.
